activities.name: Snorkeling Tours
activities.description: Explore the vibrant underwater world around Taniti's pristine coral reefs.

activities.name: Volcano Visit
activities.description: Experience the awe-inspiring sight of Taniti's active volcano. Moderate hiking.

activities.name: Rainforest Zip-Lining
activities.description: Experience the island from a bird's eye view with multiple platforms and lines. Safety equipment and instruction provided.

activities.name: Beach Activities
activities.description: Enjoy the pristine white sandy beaches surrounding Yellow Leaf Bay. Swimming, sunbathing, beach volleyball, and more. Perfect for families.

activities.name: Local History Museum
activities.description: Discover Taniti's rich cultural heritage at our local history museum.

activities.name: Chartered Fishing Tours
activities.description: Join experienced local fishermen for a deep-sea fishing adventure. All equipment provided, and you can keep your catch! Great for families and fishing enthusiasts alike.

activities.name: Helicopter Tours
activities.description: This aerial tour showcases the volcano, rainforest, beaches, and Yellow Leaf Bay. An unforgettable way to appreciate the island's diverse terrain.

activities.name: Island Boat Tours
activities.description: Cruise around Taniti and explore hidden coves, remote beaches, and coastal wildlife. Includes stops for swimming and snorkeling. Lunch provided on full-day tours.

activities.name: Art Galleries
activities.description: Visit local art galleries showcasing work by Tanitian artists. From traditional crafts to contemporary paintings, these galleries offer a window into the island's creative community.
